name: brass

brass noun
(METAL)
Add to word list
Add to word list
C1 [ U ] a bright yellow metal made from copper and zinc: The door handles were made of brass.
cla78/iStock / Getty Images Plus/GettyImages the brass C2 [ S ]
the group of brass instruments or players in a band or orchestra: The brass seems to me to be too loud in this recording. See also
brass band
brass instrument
brass section
[ C ] a thin piece of brass on the floor or wall in a church, with a picture or writing cut into it: The church has several beautiful medieval brasses.
Holmes Garden Photos/Alamy Stock Photo

brass noun [U]
(OFFICERS)
high-ranking officers in an organization, esp. the military: The Pentagon brass went along with the plan but they were not happy about it.
brass adjective [not gradable]
